contenido: Kodak Professional Portra 400 is a high-speed color negative film balanced for daylight.
Ilford Delta 3200 is a high-speed black-and-white film produced by Ilford Photo. It is designed for low-light conditions and situations where fast film is necessary.
CineStill 800T is a unique film stock designed for motion picture use but adapted for still photography, is tungsten-balanced.
Kodak Ektar 100 has an ISO rating of 100, making it a low-speed film. This means it is best suited for shooting in bright, daylight conditions.
Ilford FP4 Plus is a popular black-and-white film known for its fine grain, sharpness, and wide exposure latitude.
Kodak Portra 800 is a color negative film known for its versatility and ability to perform well in various lighting conditions.
